duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage daily, weekly, and monthly reconciliations across various issuing bank partners and processing partner relationships.
Assist in migration of manual reconciliations from spreadsheets to automated reconciliation tool.
Work with complex ledger systems & display methodical approach to resolving exceptions within them.
Monitor aging reports to support clean account reconciliation across products.
Implement controls to eliminate/prevent discrepancies and communicate with internal/external stakeholders to resolve any queries.
Maintain internal and external reporting – both routine and ad-hoc.
Communicate with payment providers, support team, financial institutions, and vendors regarding payment processing issues and unreconciled items.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Finance, Accounting, or a related field (Master's preferred)
